alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:12PM PST until December 26 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches above 6000 feet, increasing with elevation, and 2 to 6 inches below 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...Through noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible especially at higher elevations and passes. The hazardous conditions is likely to impact commuters. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be briefly heavy at times especially this evening with significantly reduced visibility and rapid accumulation of snow on roadways.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
